column4: ok, knoppix looks like it'll work, but i don't have a cdrom, is there a way to boot from an iso on the hdd?
i currently have win 95 on here
i'm googling it, but it's usualy way easier to ask some1 who might know than spend 2 hrs googling and trying one thing after another
you can't "boot from an iso" with a PC that has Windows 95 on it. Burn a CD.
